column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////If you check in on Yelp
column2: you get a free dessert tapa per person! My friend and I shared the mini ice cream sandwiches and the butterscotch custard and it was the perfect way to end the meal. Each dish was small as expected
column3: but very satisfying. My favorite was the ice cream sandwiches because they had housemade pumpkin ice cream in the middle
column4: which made the little fall-loving girl in me squeal with delight!
